column1: length ball on middle, and he works this off his hips towards midwicket. Beats the fielder inside the circle, but he doesn't give up. Chases it to the boundary, and hauls it back in. Walton the man
back of a length on middle, and cramping Munro for space. Tries to pull, but splices this to mid-on. Going for the big shot, first ball
on the legs and whipped away for a single
crunched! Full just outside off, and he throws his bat at this. Slapped past cover for a boundary
pierces midwicket! Back of length, and he stays back, before flat-batting a front-foot pull to the boundary
muscled over mid-on! Not full enough, not short enough, and he absolutely hammers a leg-side swipe over the infield
slower ball, on off stump. And he pushes to mid-off for a single
glorious! Back of a length on off, and he rides the bounce and punches through cover! Along the ground
length ball on middle, and he guides this to short third man for a single
cut through point! Length ball on middle, but Munro makes a bit of room and slaps it to Delport. He dives over the ball, and that's a freebie
length ball, just outside off, and cut past point's left!
length ball on off, but angling in, and Babar Azam simply clips this off his hips to deep backward square. It's raining fours!
a breather. Length ball, just outside off, and he mistimes a cut to point
full on off, and driven to mid-on. Babar calls early for a single, and they race across for a single
full on middle, and he simply swipes across the line, and finds the gap between midwicket and mid on. Blazes away
full just outside off, and driven to mid-off
length ball, guided to gully
over long on! A proper, slog
top-edged! The ride comes to an end. Ronchi makes no mistake
length ball, just outside off, and he mistimes a cut towards mid-on
short, just outside off, and he ducks under this one
length ball on off, and he drags a slogged leg-side swipe to the long-on fence!
length ball, nudged off the back foot to third man. Fielder's diving effort saves the boundary
worked to deep square leg, where Walton cleans up
oh dear! That was a big chance. Length ball, and he swipes across the line. In the air at long-on, but dropped
prods forward to meet this full ball, driven to mid off. Hales the man there
length ball, just outside off, and he guides this to point off the back foot for a jogging single
full and wide outside off, and he backs away to drill this through the off side. Can't beat point though
low full toss on off, and he drives down the ground to mid-on for a quick single

double whammy! full just outsidel, and he muscles this full ball over to long on. Asif Ali's there, but the ball falls just short of him, and bursts right through his hands. Error on two counts. Bowler's no-ball because he clipped the bails on his delivery stride
what a great ball! Yorker just outside off, and he can't muscle this away
pulled in front of square! Back of a length on off, and the tall Livingstone shuffles across the crease, before pummeling a six over deep midwicket
knee high full toss, and he mistimes to mid-on
full just outside off, and he meets the ball on the front foot, and drills a boundary square on the off side
full toss, low on middle, and nudged off his toes to square leg
full outside off, and played with the spin past the off side to deep extra cover
length ball, wide outside off, and he tries to cut. Mistimed to point
length ball, just outside off, and punched down the ground to mid-on. A bit of a collision between Babar and Shadab, but all good
worked away to square leg, where no one's there. Ronchi races after it to stop the double
length ball, extra bounce off the deck, and cut away to deep point
low full toss, just outside off, and his attempted cover drive is spliced to point
full toss, wide outside off, and clobbered through the off side. Misfield by Asif again on the boundary as Islamabad concede another freak four
full just outside off, and drilled to Shadab at long on
back of a length, outside off stump, and guided to backward point
Terrific work by Faheem at third man to stop the boundary. This was played fine by Babar
short outside off, and cut with the spin to point
full outside off, and he drives with the spin to long off. Walk across for a single
full on leg, and he drills this to long on
tapped off the front foot to short cover
faster one to end the over. Full just outside off, and he caresses this to deep extra cover
worked off his hips to midwicket. Nobody there
slower ball, full on off, and he mistimes a slogged shot down the ground
back of a length, and he rocks back to punch though to deep extra cover
length ball, just outside off, and he rocks back once again, but mistimes the shot to mid-off
team hundred And what a breeze it's been. A gently front foot drive to long on
legbreak just outside off, and played with the spin to long off
back foot cut to point
gone! Tossed up on off, and he goes for a big shot. Splices this slog, and Faheem - at long on - makes no mistake
full on middle, and skidding through. Ingram tries to nudge it leg-side off the back foot, but leading edge takes it to mid off

full on off, and he takes a big stride forward to deep midwicket. They want the second run, and Asif Ali throws it from the deep. Shadab parries the ball onto the stumps, and Ingram could be out! Replays suggest that Ingram was in though
length ball, just outside off, and tapped back to Shadab
length ball on his body, and nudged to square leg
length ball on off, from around the wicket. Worked off his hips to deep midwicket
over the wicket to Ingram. Full on middle, and he drives past the non-striker to long on for a single

length ball, just outside off from around the wicket. Babar tries to tickle this late down to third man, but he can't get the connection. Through to the keeper, but Rumman believes that Babar's edged this. IU review! Is there an edge? Looks like there's a touch off Babar's toe-end! Brilliant call by Rumman. Babar is out!
length ball, wide outside off, and clattered to point. They scamper across for a dangerous single
length ball angling into his body, and worked off his hips to the vacant square leg region
full just outside leg stump, and he goes down on one knee, and sweeps this googly over fine leg!
length ball outside off, and turning further away. Tries to cut but misses
flat outside off, and he cuts away to deep point. Just a single
length ball on off, and turning into his pads. Inside-edges it into his pads
pushed to cover, and they race across for a single
paddled! Moves across the stumps, and ramps this over short fine leg
back of a length on leg, and nudged away to the gap near midwicket. Bowler gives it a chase
drilled to mid off's right, and the fielder races towards it to intercept
full toss, wide outside off, and he clobbers a cut. Straight to deep point though. An opportunity wasted
mistimes a drive, to Alex Hales at mid off
yorker outside off, and he brings his bat down to guide it fine
length ball, just outside off, and he drives through the ball's line to the off side. Another tidy over
low full toss wide outside off, and he does well to slice a cut through to the point fence
length ball, but slower outside off stump. Waits for the ball to come to him, before punching to extra cover
back of a length, just outside off, and Ingram tries to ramp this over third man. Can't get any connection though
full on middle, and he drills a checked-drive to long on
full just outside off, and driven back past the bowler to long off
yorker on middle, and he does well to dig this over Rumman's head. Long off cleans up though
much needed! Full toss on off, and he gets his bat under this. Golf swing through the ball's line, and hammered over long off
pulled, but holes out! Back of a length on off, and he swivels to pull. Struck well, but straight to the sweeper fielder
off the mark right away. Drives this inswinging yorker to long on
back of a length on middle, and he mistimes a pull along the ground to deep midwicket
you beauty, Musa! Back of a length outside off, and he tries to drag a pulled shot. Mistimed, and straight down the throat of the fielder at cow corner.
full on off, and he mistimes a drive to cover. Amazing over for Islamabad
full on off, and he offers the bat's straight face to drive. Just a single
length ball outside off, and angling further away. Too wide
oh dear, Karachi! Around the wicket to Dunk, length ball angling into the left-hander, and he splices a leg-side swipe only to long on
length ball on middle, and worked off his legs to square leg
slides across the batsman, as he tries to run this down fine. Through to Ronchi
spanked! Length ball angling away, and he walks down the wicket, before flat-batting a shot through cover
tapped off the backfoot to mid off
yorker on middle, and dug away to mid-off for a quick run
bull's eye! Sami races after the ball after the yorker was played to the leg side. The batsman do a bit of a yes-no-yes-no, and Sami takes aim at the bowler's end
yorker outside leg stump, and squeezed away to the off side
overpitched on leg, and he clobbers this past the bowler's left to long on
low full toss on leg, and tapped away to the off side
full on middle, and he hammers this over the bowler's head. But Shadab - at long on - runs across the boundary to intercept
attempted yorker on leg stump, and muscled down to long on by Imad
full on middle, and the attempted straight drive flies off the bat's inside half to the leg side
yorker on middle, and dug away straight. Faheem sticks his hand out, but the ball goes over it and hits the non-striker's stumps
back of a length outside leg, and Amir backs away before pulling. But the ball just goes over his bat and into Ronchi's gloves

full outside leg stump, and muscled away to deep midwicket. They want the second, or do they? Imad says no, and then says yes, and that means Amir is struggling at the batsman's end. Flat throw, quick glovework, and Karachi lose their eighth. Imad wasn't decisive enough there
one brings two! Collapso. Yorker on leg stump, and he goes across the stumps to flick fine. He misses, and Faheem clips leg stump
yorker on off, and he muscles this down to long off. Says no to the single
nearly takes his stumps. Full outside off, and Imad shuffles across to play the ramp. Hits his pad, and almost clips his off stump
around the wicket, full on middle, and muscled away to mid off. They go past 160
low full toss on off, and drilled to wide mid off
excellent from Islamabad! Islamabad need 162 to win. Yorker, just outside off, and through to the keeper.
full on middle, and gently defended off the front foot
full on middle, and driven down the ground. Safe, because there's no mid-on
length ball on leg, and drifting into middle. Defended off the back foot
length ball on off, and he stays on the back foot. Blocked
length ball on middle, and punched to cover. Can't pierce the gap though
good over ruined! Full on off, and just a bit of extra width on offer. Muscles a shot over long on to get Islamabad's ball rolling
length ball, angling across, and he crunches a cut to point. But Livingstone dives to his left to intercept. He's hurt his hand slightly, but saves a boundary for certain
full on middle, but sliding down leg
full on off, and he drives straight to the bowler. Amir nearly squared Delport up there with a bit of late movement away
length ball on middle, and caressed off the back foot to cover. Packed infield there
back of a length on off, and he goes for an expansive pull. Ball soars over his bat
length ball on middle, and tapped away to the off side. They scamper across for a single
full on leg stump, and tapped down to mid-on for a quick single
shot! Full outside leg, and he skips down the ground before whipping a leg-side swipe past midwicket
back of a length on middle, and going across. Delport tries to drive but ball hits the top-half of the ball. Rolls down to mid-off
ouch! Full on middle, and he hammers this back to the bowler. Yamin sticks his left-hand out, and it's hit him near the webbing. Medical attention needed
length ball, not short enough, and he swivels to pull along the ground. Protection in the deep though
what a wicket! Yorker on middle, and Ronchi backs away to muscle a shot. Tries to drill this through the covers, but mis-hits only to mid on
overpitched on off, and mistimed to mid-off
full on off, and driven down the ground to long on
length ball on leg, and he clips this off the pads past the fielder at square leg! Pierces the gap, and good wristwork
length ball on off, and punched down the ground to mid-off
tapped back to Wasim
crunched! Long-off has no chance. Overpitched on off, and he muscles this past Hales
length ball angling in, and punched off the back foot to mid-on
length ball, just outside off, and he tries to cut this square. Ball jags inwards, and he under-edges this onto his body
low full toss outside leg stump, but hits Delport's legs. Rolls away to the off side
back of a length outside leg, and the ball coming into Delport's body. Tries to work it towards the leg side, but a leading edge takes it to cover
oh dear this is wild. Yorker outside leg stump, and Dunk fails to collect. Two free runs for Islamabad
length ball on middle, and he flat-bats this down to mid-off. Mistimed for a single
length ball, on off, and tapped off the front foot to mid off
that's outta here! Full on his toes, and he clears his front leg, before depositing a lofted shot over long off
slows things up. Length ball angling in, and nudged off his hips to midwicket
glorious! Length ball angling across, and he absolutely slaps this past the infield for a boundary. Superb cut
length ball on middle, and guided off the back foot to point. They want a single, but better sense prevails
slick! Yorker on middle, but Hales brings his bat's down, opens it's face, and plays a ridiculous tickle down to third man
length ball, too wide outside off, and Delport tries to cut. Misses
length ball on off, and worked away off the back foot to the leg side
length ball outside off, and turning inwards. Punched to point off the back foot
length ball, wide outside off, and cut away to deep point
half-tracker on off, but he dabs this down to long on for a single
length ball, wide outside off, and cut away to the off side
full on off, and he clocks this straight down to long on. Falls just short of the fielder there. Almost carrying to Babar
fast hands! Length ball on leg, and he quickly swivels, and hammers a pull to the backward-square boundary
the arm ball angling across, and Delport wants to cut. Misses
full on off, and tapped past the bowler's left to long on
length ball on off, and defended off the back foot to long on
length ball on leg, and nudged off his pads to the leg side. They walk across for one
straight to long on! Length ball outside off, and he flat-bats this with the turn. Doesn't have the elevation though, and Babar stays on the boundary to pouch a difficult catch
Length ball on off and spinning across the batsman. Nearly takes the outside edge of his bat. Extra bounce
Full on off and this turns across the batsman. Walton presses forward to defend, but the ball takes an outside edge and Dunk does really well to hold on
Length ball turning in, and punched off the back foot to long on
spins away after pick  and Hales let lt go
driven down the ground to long off
full on leg, and flicked off his toes to the leg side
full on middle, and nudged off his toes to square leg
oh what a shot! Full on middle, and he swings across the line after getting down on one knee
up and over! Full on leg, but Hales shuffles away to display all three stumps, and them hammers this over the bowler's head
full on leg, and he tries to sweep over short fine leg. Misses, but wide called
length ball on off, and he tries to place a cut behind square. Finds the fielder
length ball on middle, and cut in front of square
full on off, and worked away to the leg side
full on off, and defended away to cover
length ball on off, and he backs away before cutting. Two dots in a row
length ball just outside off, and skidding through. Hales misses the defense and it goes through to Dunk
full just outside off, and the drive finds cover once again
full on middle, and Hales chooses to block off the front foot. Just one off the over!
stumped? Length ball outside off, and turning away. Talat's forced to stretch as he misses his drive. Dunk whips the bails off, but was his back leg already inside the crease? Yes, it's fine
damn! Slogged over deep midwicket
length ball on middle, and carved away to deep extra cover. Says no to the second
back of a length on off, and angling in. Pulled to deep backward square
length ball, wide outside off, and punched to long off for one
full on leg, and turning across Hales as he tries to sweep. Hits his body
full just outside off, and chipped towards cover. Hales is halfway down the wicket before he chooses to run back. Nearly run out
half-tracker sliding in, and fended off the back foot
length ball, wide outside off, and cut away to deep point
boundary off the last ball of his spell! Full on off, and he goes down on one knee before clobbering a six over long on! Just about clears the boundary
crunched! Full on off, and he offers the bat's full face to this. Driven between the umpire and the non-striker, and long-on does not bother moving
length ball, very wide outside off, and he miscues a cut to cover
play and a miss. Full outside off, and tries to drive
cut off the back foot to the fielder at deep point for a single
length ball just outside off, and Talat smothers this with soft hands towards midwicket
length ball on middle, and flicked off the back foot to square leg for a single
full on leg stump, and driven down the ground to wide long on. Team hundred
length ball, wide outside off, and guided off the back foot to point for one
full on leg, and he muscles another straight shot to wide long on
yorker on off, but he goes for a wild leg-side heave, and it takes the bat's toe end. Runs down fine to short fine leg
backs away to cut this square. Through to the keeper
oh, my, my! Big over. Full toss on off, and he's golf swung this just over Babar Azam at long on
back of a length on off, and Hales slices a pull right to Babar at long on. He runs forward to take the catch, but the ball dips late, and he drops it!
length ball on off, and he shapes up to cut. Misses
low full toss on middle, and drilled away to deep midwicket

what a wicket to take! Karachi are back in the game. Babar Azam makes amends. Length ball angling in, and he's sliced a flat-batted pull once again. Straight to long on. Disappointment for Hales; Karachi is jubilant. Nearly a no-ball for front foot, but he's ok
tries to ramp it over short fine leg, but can't clear the infield. A dangerous single
guided to point for no run
back of a length, wide outside off, and cut away to backward point. Amir cleans up
boooooom! Full on off, and he muscles this over wide long on!
full and wide outside off, and hammered to deep extra
waist high full toss and he goes inside-out over cover! Gets enough power behind it, and the ball hits the skirting near the boundary on the flush. Half-a-dozen
good comeback. Shuffles across to deposit this one again, but he can't get the connection
Shinwari, you beauty! Not full enough for the long-handle swipe, and he's sliced this slog. Babar at long on gets underneath it, and Shinwari takes a crucial wicket
yorker first ball. Full outside off, and dug away to the off side
driven to cover
pressure. Full and wide outside off, and too wide according to the umpire
tucked away to the vacant midwicket region. Played so softly that they can come back for the second
yorker on middle, and tapped to long on for a single
picks the slower ball well! Length, too wide, and Faheem simply clatters this over extra cover! Long handle coming to the party
top-edged over the keeper! Tries to pull, but gets the result anyway. Islamabad need 18 off 12
length, wide outside off, and he tries to drag a pull shot. Ball's gone in the air and Babar runs in front long off, but this time he drops it! Number 5 will have to wait
full on off, and the attempted slog takes an inside edge to the leg side
drilled to long on
yorker on middle, and dug away to the leg side. Spot on, but Islamabad get a single anyway
that's outta here! Full and wide outside off, but Asif gets towards the off side, before lifting a six right over Yamin's head
full and wide outside off, but the cover drive takes an inside edge to mid on. They scamper back for the second

Faheem you beauty! Length ball on off, and he pulls to the leg side. Babar runs towards the ball, and dives to take a catch, but the ball goes through him. Difficult for him, and 100 marks for the effort
goes for the glory shot, but taken at deep point! Full and wide outside off, and he clatters this over point. Yamin takes a brilliant sliding catch to send Faheem back
Islamabad United qualify into the second qualifier! Length ball on leg, and flicked off his pads fine down the leg side. Karachi Kings are out
